## ğŸ› ï¸ ë°©ë²• 1: Python ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ (requests + BeautifulSoup)

```python
import os
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def fetch_wikipedia_article(title, save_dir):
    url = f"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/{title}"
    response = requests.get(url)

    if response.status_code != 200:
        print(f"âš ï¸ {title} ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ê¸° ì‹¤íŒ¨: {response.status_code}")
        return

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")
    content_div = soup.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"})
    
    # ë³¸ë¬¸ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë§Œ ì¶”ì¶œ
    paragraphs = content_div.find_all(["p", "h2", "h3", "ul", "ol"])
    text = "\n\n".join(p.get_text() for p in paragraphs)

    # ì €ì¥
    os.makedirs(save_dir, exist_ok=True)
    file_path = os.path.join(save_dir, f"{title}.md")
    with open(file_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write(f"# {title}\n\n{url}\n\n{text}")
    
    print(f"âœ… ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ: {file_path}")

# ì˜ˆì‹œ ì‹¤í–‰
if __name__ == "__main__":
    titles = [
        "Python_(programming_language)",
        "C_(programming_language)",
        "Alan_Turing"
    ]
    for t in titles:
        fetch_wikipedia_article(t, "./memory/sources/wiki_raw/")
```

```python
import os
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def read_and_save(title):
    url = f"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/{title}"
    res = requests.get(url)
    if res.status_code != 200:
        print(f"âš ï¸ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {res.status_code}")
        return

    soup = BeautifulSoup(res.text, "html.parser")
    content = soup.find("div", id="bodyContent")
    if not content:
        print("âŒ ë³¸ë¬¸ ì°¾ê¸° ì‹¤íŒ¨")
        return

    paragraphs = content.find_all(["p", "h2", "h3", "ul"])
    lines = [p.get_text().strip() for p in paragraphs if p.get_text().strip()]

    output = f"# {title}\n\nğŸ”— {url}\n\n" + "\n\n".join(lines[:10])  # ìš°ì„  10ë‹¨ë½

    save_dir = "./memory/sources/wiki_raw/"
    os.makedirs(save_dir, exist_ok=True)
    save_path = os.path.join(save_dir, f"{title}.md")
    with open(save_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write(output)
    
    print(f"âœ… ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ: {save_path}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    read_and_save("C_(programming_language)")
```

```python
# wiki_read_deep.py

import os
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from markdownify import markdownify as md
import json
from urllib.parse import urlparse, unquote

# ğŸ§  ì‚¬ìš©ì ì…ë ¥ URL
URL = input("ğŸ“¥ ì½ì„ Wikipedia URLì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”: ").strip()

# ğŸ“ ì €ì¥ ë£¨íŠ¸
SAVE_ROOT = "../../memory/sources/wiki"

def extract_topic_name(url: str) -> str:
    parsed = urlparse(url)
    topic = parsed.path.split("/")[-1]
    return unquote(topic.replace("_", " "))

def fetch_html(url: str) -> str:
    headers = {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0"}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    response.raise_for_status()
    return response.text

def extract_main_content(html: str) -> tuple[str, list[str]]:
    soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
    content_div = soup.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"})
    links = []
    for a in content_div.find_all("a", href=True):
        href = a["href"]
        if href.startswith("/wiki/") and not href.startswith("/wiki/Special:"):
            links.append(f"https://en.wikipedia.org{href}")
    markdown_text = md(str(content_div), heading_style="ATX")
    return markdown_text, sorted(set(links))

def save_to_folder(topic: str, markdown: str, links: list[str], url: str):
    folder = os.path.join(SAVE_ROOT, topic.replace(" ", "_"))
    os.makedirs(folder, exist_ok=True)

    with open(os.path.join(folder, "main.md"), "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write(markdown)

    with open(os.path.join(folder, "links.txt"), "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write("\n".join(links))

    metadata = {
        "topic": topic,
        "url": url,
        "num_links": len(links)
    }
    with open(os.path.join(folder, "metadata.json"), "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        json.dump(metadata, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

def main():
    print(f"ğŸ” ì½ê¸° ì‹œì‘: {URL}")
    topic = extract_topic_name(URL)
    html = fetch_html(URL)
    markdown, links = extract_main_content(html)
    save_to_folder(topic, markdown, links, URL)
    print(f"âœ… ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ: {topic} ({len(links)}ê°œì˜ ë§í¬)")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

import time

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from markdownify import markdownify as md

from langchain.vectorstores import Chroma
from langchain.embeddings import OpenAIEmbeddings
from langchain.text_splitter import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()

# âœ… ì„¤ì • ê²½ë¡œ
MASTER_LIST = "/home/duksan/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5/backend/memory/sources/docs/memory_seed_master_list.md"
SAVE_ROOT = "/home/duksan/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5/backend/memory/sources/docs/wiki_pages"
VECTOR_PATH = "/home/duksan/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5/backend/memory/vectors/docs_memory"

# âœ… ë²¡í„° ì €ì¥ì†Œ ì¤€ë¹„
embeddings = OpenAIEmbeddings()
if not os.path.exists(VECTOR_PATH):
    os.makedirs(VECTOR_PATH)
vectorstore = Chroma(persist_directory=VECTOR_PATH, embedding_function=embeddings)

# âœ… í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë¶„í• ê¸°
text_splitter = RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter(chunk_size=500, chunk_overlap=50)

def fetch_markdown_from_url(url):
    print(f"ğŸ” ì½ëŠ” ì¤‘: {url}")
    res = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(res.text, "html.parser")
    content = soup.find("div", {"id": "bodyContent"})
    return md(str(content)) if content else ""

def save_and_ingest(title, lang, markdown):
    folder = os.path.join(SAVE_ROOT, title.replace("/", "_"))
    os.makedirs(folder, exist_ok=True)
    path = os.path.join(folder, f"{lang}.md")
    with open(path, "w") as f:
        f.write(markdown)
    print(f"âœ… ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ: {path}")
    
    docs = text_splitter.create_documents([markdown])
    vectorstore.add_documents(docs)
    print(f"âœ… ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì™„ë£Œ: {title} ({lang})")

def run():
    with open(MASTER_LIST, "r") as f:
        lines = f.readlines()

    for line in lines:
        if "|" not in line:
            continue
        parts = line.strip().split("|")
        if len(parts) < 3:
            continue

        title = parts[0].strip()
        url_en = parts[1].strip()
        url_ko = parts[2].strip()

        try:
            md_en = fetch_markdown_from_url(url_en)
            save_and_ingest(title, "en", md_en)
            time.sleep(3)  # âœ… ë”œë ˆì´ë¡œ ìœ„í‚¤ ì„œë²„ ë¶€ë‹´ ì™„í™”

            md_ko = fetch_markdown_from_url(url_ko)
            save_and_ingest(title, "ko", md_ko)
            time.sleep(3)
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âš ï¸ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {title} - {e}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    run()"}
